categories.name: Efficient copywriting/decision-making
categories.description: Extremely condensed text template, directly output decision-making, execution and review

templates.name: Read decision canvas in seconds
templates.short_description: Understand decision-making on one screen: goals/signals/options/recommendations/72-hour actions.
templates.prompt_template: From the perspective of "{{decision_owner}}", write a 1-page decision canvas for {{topic}}. Structure: 1) Goals and hard constraints (limited to {{word_limit}} words, use bullets) 2) Key signals (data or facts) 3) 3 feasible options: benefits/costs/risks 4) Recommended options + strongest objections 5) 3 actions within 72 hours. Tone {{tone}}, the output uses Chinese and English subtitles.

placeholders.label: Decision maker
placeholders.hint: The person or role responsible for making decisions

auto_checks: The text should not exceed word_limit words
Must list 3 options and give recommendations
manual_checklist: Are recommendations based on key signals rather than intuition?
Are the objections specific and verifiable?
Are the 72-hour actions directly executable and measurable?

example_inputs.name: New product pricing decisions

placeholder_values.topic: Initial pricing strategy for new product A

example_inputs.notes: Emphasis on the parallelism of signals and actions

templates.name: Lightning Brief → Delivery
templates.short_description: Compress fragment information into executable brief + checklist.
templates.prompt_template: Write a lightning brief for deliverable {{deliverable}}. Input material: {{raw_notes}}. Audience {{audience}}, must contain finished product criteria: {{definition_of_done}}, constraints: {{constraints}}. Output: 1) 3 line summary 2) Finished product elements checklist 3) Style/Taboos 4) Responsible person and deadline reservations.

placeholders.label: Complete standards
placeholders.hint: What must the finished product meet

auto_checks: The summary should not exceed 3 lines
Checklist covers key elements of the deliverables
manual_checklist: Are the completion standards acceptable and measurable?
Are there any clear contraindications or risk warnings?
Can the audience execute it at a glance?

placeholder_values.raw_notes: The existing conversion rate is 12% and needs to be increased to 20%; it must be compatible with SSO; the brand tone is calm and restrained; the copywriting needs to be lighter; the first draft of the wireframe has been completed.
placeholder_values.definition_of_done: The conversion rate increased to more than 18% within 7 days after going online; it is compatible with SSO and mobile phone number login; the copy has passed the brand review; the performance indicators maintain TTFB < 200ms.
placeholder_values.constraints: Grayscale will be online within a week

templates.name: The red team quickly rebuts
templates.short_description: Generate the sharpest objections and repair actions to avoid blind spots.
templates.prompt_template: As the red team, for the solution: {{plan_summary}}, put forward the sharpest refutation and repair suggestions in the {{context}} scenario. Output: ① 3 rebuttal reasons, each containing potential consequences ② Evidence that needs to be supplemented ③ Immediate repair actions (limited to {{action_limit}} items). Tone {{tone}}, no politeness.

placeholders.label: Proposal Summary
placeholders.hint: The core content of the current plan or strategy

placeholders.label: Number of patching actions
placeholders.hint: Maximum number of patch actions to list

auto_checks: Rebuttal and potential consequences must be given
The number of patch actions does not exceed action_limit
manual_checklist: Does the rebuttal hit key assumptions rather than minutiae?
Can the patching action be performed immediately?
Do the recommendations contain verifiable evidence-based guidance?

example_inputs.name: Growth Experiment Red Team

placeholder_values.plan_summary: plans to pop up coupons on the homepage to attract new users to place orders, with the goal of increasing the first order conversion by 5%.
placeholder_values.context: The budget is limited; the main users are 25-35 years old in first- and second-tier cities; compliance requirements must be met.

example_inputs.notes: Pay attention to compliance and user experience risks

categories.name: Structured products
categories.description: Structured output such as system prompts and test matrices with high signal-to-noise ratio

templates.name: Agent system prompts blueprint
templates.short_description: Minimal and complete system prompts: roles, processes, rejection lists, output formats.
templates.prompt_template: Generate a system prompt blueprint for a {{agent_type}} Agent. Mission: {{mission}}. Available tools: {{tools}}. Guardrail: {{guardrails}}. Requirements: Output role setting, input parsing process, rejection list, output format example, limited to {{tokens_limit}} tokens, tone {{output_style}}.

placeholders.label: Agent type
placeholders.hint: Such as: data analysis assistant, code inspector

placeholders.label: Mission
placeholders.hint: The core tasks to be completed by Agent

placeholders.label: Guardrail
placeholders.hint: Conduct, privacy, or compliance restrictions to avoid

auto_checks: The output contains four parts: role/process/rejection/format
Controlled within tokens_limit
manual_checklist: Does the reject list cover high-risk inputs?
Does the process explicitly input parsing → inference → output?
Can the format example be copied and used directly?

placeholder_values.mission: Review the code snippets of the front-end and Node services, locate security vulnerabilities and provide repair suggestions.
placeholder_values.tools: can read code snippets and query internal security baseline documents.
placeholder_values.guardrails: No real credentials can be output, no code can be executed, and no APIs can be made up out of thin air.

templates.name: Extreme test matrix
templates.short_description: gives a clear list of high-risk use cases, disruptive inputs, and observable signals.
templates.prompt_template: Generate a limit test matrix for function {{feature}} at {{platform}}. Key process: {{critical_flows}}. Risk focus: {{risk_focus}}. Constraints: {{constraints}}. {{case_depth}} use cases for output prioritization: use case description, destructive inputs, expected results, observable signals {{success_signal}}. The tone directly gives the conclusion without mentioning the concept.

placeholders.label: Function
placeholders.hint: Function or scenario to be tested

placeholders.label: Key processes
placeholders.hint: Core user process or interface call

placeholders.label: Restrictions
placeholders.hint: If data cannot be exported from the public network, time is limited, etc.

placeholders.label: Number of use cases
placeholders.hint: Number of use cases to be covered

placeholders.label: Observable signal
placeholders.hint: How to observe success or failure

auto_checks: The number of use cases does not exceed case_depth
Each use case contains expected and observable signals
manual_checklist: Are high-risk and borderline inputs covered?
Are destructive inputs specific and reproducible?
Can observable signals be monitored or recorded?

example_inputs.name: Payment process limit test

placeholder_values.critical_flows: Place an order -> Discount overlay -> Payment gateway -> Notification callback -> Order placement
placeholder_values.success_signal: There is no error code in the log, the order status is consistent, and the indicator QPS is stable

example_inputs.notes: Destructive input is required (internet disconnection, slow request, abnormal amount, etc.)

categories.name: Visual proposal
categories.description: Low saturation, implementable visual prompt template

templates.name: Brand Story Triptych
templates.short_description: Three scene prompts under the same visual language, keeping the style consistent.
templates.prompt_template: Generate triptych visual cues for brand {{brand_name}}, main theme {{hero_story}}. Unified visual language: {{visual_style}}, tone {{palette}}, lens feel {{camera_style}}, light {{lighting}}, frame {{aspect_ratio}}. Three scenes: 1) {{scene_one}} 2) {{scene_two}} 3) {{scene_three}}. Emphasis on white space, the brand logo appears lightly, and the overall saturation is low.

placeholders.label: Brand name
placeholders.hint: The brand or product line to be presented

placeholders.label: Core Story
placeholders.hint: Summarize the brand story in one sentence

placeholders.label: Hue
placeholders.hint: Low saturated main colors, such as: light gray, foggy blue, light apricot
placeholders.default: Light gray, foggy blue, light apricot

auto_checks: The three scenes maintain the same style and tone
The picture is low saturated and has sufficient white space
manual_checklist: Are brand elements low-key and recognizable?
Are the three stories coherent and conflict-free?
Is the light consistent with the lens feel?

placeholder_values.hero_story: Lightweight technology integrated into daily life
placeholder_values.palette: Light gray, fog blue, micron silver
placeholder_values.scene_one: Desk by the window, glass speakers and notebooks, leaving a sense of white space
placeholder_values.scene_two: In the corner of the living room, smart light bulbs next to the fabric sofa, mixed warm and cold light
placeholder_values.scene_three: Bedroom at night, minimalist bedside table lamp and foggy blue wall, the brand logo faintly emerges

templates.name: Material texture close-up
templates.short_description: Low saturation, high detail material photography tips, highlighting light, shadow and texture.
templates.prompt_template: Take a close-up of the material of {{subject}}, emphasizing {{material_focus}} texture, environment {{environment}}, light {{lighting}}, lens {{lens}}, background {{background}}, tone {{tone_palette}}, resolution {{resolution}}. Highlight details without over-saturation, leaving the image blank.

placeholders.label: Subject
placeholders.hint: Items or materials to be photographed

placeholders.label: Texture focus
placeholders.hint: For example: frosted metal, frosted glass, fabric texture

placeholders.label: Lens
placeholders.hint: Focal length and depth of field

placeholders.label: Hue
placeholders.hint: Recommend low saturation, such as: milk gray + fog blue
placeholders.default: Low saturated milk gray + foggy blue

auto_checks: Low saturation, no overexposure or oversharpening
The subject has clear texture and the background is clean
manual_checklist: Does the light highlight texture without creating hard shadows?
Is the focus on key parts of the material?
Are the white space and color matching kept light and restrained?

example_inputs.name: Close-up of titanium alloy equipment

placeholder_values.subject: Titanium alloy smart speaker frame
placeholder_values.material_focus: Frosted metal texture and edge chamfering
placeholder_values.tone_palette: Low saturated milk gray + foggy blue

example_inputs.notes: Highlight the transition between light and shadow and smooth chamfering

templates.name: Old KV theme changed
templates.short_description: Maintain the original painting style and layout, quickly change the theme and retain the time information.
templates.prompt_template: Based on the title picture of the original KV {{source_kv}} rebirth theme {{new_theme}}, retaining the original style, texture, layout and brand elements {{must_keep_elements}}, the event time is used or speculated {{event_dates}}, the light {{lighting}}, the layout {{layout_style}}, and the frame {{aspect_ratio}}. Maintain low noise, white space and readability.

placeholders.label: Original KV description
placeholders.hint: The scene, style, color, and subject of the original picture

placeholders.label: Activity time
placeholders.hint: For example, 3.18-3.20, if left blank, it will be used automatically

auto_checks: Retain the original style and body proportions
Activity time and new topic can be read on the same screen
manual_checklist: Are the original brand assets intact?
Are the new theme elements compatible with the original style?
Is text/time contrast sufficient?

templates.name: Single frame extended storyboard
templates.short_description: Expand multi-shot storyboards from one picture to maintain narrative coherence and consistent painting style.
templates.prompt_template: Extend {{shot_count}} storyboards from the base screen {{anchor_frame}}, story line {{storyline}}, and retain elements {{continuity_notes}}. Camera movement {{camera_movement}}, tone {{color_mood}}, frame {{aspect_ratio}}. Each frame is marked with camera angle and action.

placeholders.label: Basic screen
placeholders.hint: The subject, environment, light, and style of the original frame

placeholders.label: Story line
placeholders.hint: Storyboard narrative main line or theme

placeholders.label: Hue
enum_options: Comparison of warm and cold movies
placeholders.default: Comparison of warm and cold movies

auto_checks: The number of shots is equal to shot_count
Tone and style remain consistent across frames
manual_checklist: Does the narrative flow and the camera movements make sense?
Do key elements appear consistently across frames?
Is the composition of each frame clear and free of information congestion?

templates.name: Composition analysis poster
templates.short_description: Automatically identify product features and raw materials, generate posters and strengthen selling points.
templates.prompt_template: Create an ingredient analysis poster for product {{product_name}}, with core raw materials {{ingredients}}, main selling points {{benefit}}, highlighting objects {{hero_object}}, brand style {{brand_style}}, light {{lighting}}, composition {{composition}}, and tone {{tone_palette}}. Copywriting {{copy_line}} can be added to maintain low saturation and high texture.

placeholders.label: Main object
placeholders.hint: Bottle, packaging or main visual object

placeholders.label: Composition
enum_options: Leave a blank space in the center
placeholders.default: Leave a blank space in the center

auto_checks: The main components and selling points are readable
Low color saturation and no overexposure
manual_checklist: Do the raw materials/fragrance match the selling point?
Is the brand tone consistent with the font?
Are the main body and decoration proportions balanced?

templates.name: High fidelity UI screen
templates.short_description: Think about the needs, output high-fidelity interface and layout, and adapt to multiple terminals.
templates.prompt_template: For {{product_type}}, for {{platform}}, generate a high-fidelity UI screen, including key actions {{key_actions}} and display data {{data_to_show}}. Reference style {{style_reference}}, color {{colorway}}, typography density {{layout_density}}, components {{components}}. The output needs to have realistic lighting and usability.

placeholders.label: Product type
placeholders.hint: Function or industry: SaaS, transaction, education, etc.

placeholders.label: Key actions
placeholders.hint: The action or task flow that the user wants to complete

placeholders.label: Main data
placeholders.hint: Charts, lists, status and other core information

placeholders.label: Color matching
placeholders.hint: Such as: low saturation neutral color + accent color
placeholders.default: Low saturated neutral color + accent color

auto_checks: The interface conforms to the platform size and proportion
Key action elements are clearly visible
manual_checklist: Is the information hierarchy readable at a glance?
Are the brand style and color matching consistent?
Do interactive controls have clickable/swipeable hints?

templates.name: Use the UI variant of the painting style
templates.short_description: Retain interaction and IA, and redraw the interface style according to the new theme.
templates.prompt_template: Based on the existing interface {{source_ui}}, maintaining the information architecture and layout, and redrawing it as the theme {{new_theme}}. Color {{brand_palette}}, Font {{typography}}, Reserved {{keep_flows}}, Limitations {{constraints}}, Equipment {{device}}, Fidelity {{fidelity_level}}. The output maintains the same style of painting, light and shadow, and component proportions.

placeholders.label: Original interface description
placeholders.hint: Existing interface elements and style keywords

placeholders.label: New topic
placeholders.hint: Such as "Dark Night Cyber" and "Spring Limited"

placeholders.label: Reserved elements
placeholders.hint: Information structure, component location, or interaction rhythm

auto_checks: The layout and interaction area have not drifted
Fidelity meets selection
manual_checklist: Do thematic elements blend in without obscuring key information?
Are the fonts/colors consistent with the brand?
Is interactive usability affected by decoration?

templates.name: English Vocabulary Illustration Card
templates.short_description: Analyze the theme to generate illustrations + word annotations to assist English learning.
templates.prompt_template: Focusing on the learning topic {{learning_topic}}, generate illustrated learning cards for the word {{target_words}}, suitable for age {{age_range}}. Illustration style {{illustration_style}}, layout {{layout}}, color matching {{color_palette}}, pronunciation or Chinese prompt {{overlay_notes}} can be marked. Keep it clear, friendly and high contrast.

placeholders.label: Target word
placeholders.hint: Comma separated list of English words

placeholders.label: Marking tips
placeholders.hint: Whether to display phonetic symbols/Chinese definitions/examples

auto_checks: Each word has a corresponding icon
Clear contrast between text and illustrations
manual_checklist: Does the illustration accurately express the meaning of the word?
Is the color scheme appropriate for the age group?
Is the annotation information concise and readable?

templates.name: Automatically research information cards
templates.short_description: Aggregate search content into information cards, highlighting key facts and conclusions.
templates.prompt_template: For topic {{topic}} (time range {{timeframe}}), generate an information card containing facts {{facts}} and credibility {{credibility}}. Visual style {{visual_style}}, color tone {{palette}}, frame {{aspect_ratio}}, annotation {{callouts}} can be added. Emphasize hierarchy, contrast, and reference clarity.

placeholders.label: Color matching
placeholders.hint: Such as cold color technology/warm color science popularization

placeholders.label: Keynote
placeholders.hint: Data or conclusions that need to be emphasized

auto_checks: Information card contains at least 3 key points
The text contrast is sufficient and easy to read
manual_checklist: Do the facts have source/credibility hints?
Does the format highlight the main conclusion?
Does color support information hierarchy?

templates.name: Automatic PPT single page
templates.short_description: Generate a PPT single page according to the structure, taking into account the story line and brand tone.
templates.prompt_template: Output PPT single page for target {{audience}}, core target {{slide_goal}}, outline {{sections}}. Visual style {{visual_style}}, chart type {{chart_type}}, frame {{aspect_ratio}}, Logo position {{logo_position}}. Reflect branding, white space and presentation readability.

placeholders.label: Core goals
placeholders.hint: The key information to be conveyed on this page

auto_checks: Comprehensive presentation of outline points
White space and font size are suitable for demonstration reading
manual_checklist: Are brand elements placed in a standardized manner?
Does the diagram echo the main points?
Is the presentation level clear and talkable?

templates.name: News summary visual card
templates.short_description: Automatically summarize news into visual cards, highlighting the time and conclusion.
templates.prompt_template: Generate news summary card, subject {{news_topic}}, date {{news_date}}, key points {{key_points}}, source region {{source_region}}, stance {{stance}}. Style {{illustration_style}}, color temperature {{color_temperature}}, may include disclaimer {{disclaimer}}. Make sure the title is eye-catching, the time is readable, and the information is layered.

placeholders.label: News date
placeholders.hint: YYYY-MM-DD, leave time space if not filled in

placeholders.label: Disclaimer
placeholders.hint: Such as "information needs to be verified, there may be a lag"
placeholders.default: The information needs to be verified, there may be a lag

auto_checks: Date/subject clearly visible
Contains more than 3 key points
manual_checklist: Does the expression remain neutral or consistent with a position choice?
Is the time and source marked?
Does the image and text level capture the key points at a glance?

templates.name: Visualization of motion trajectories
templates.short_description: analyzes motion keyframes and generates trajectory and speed visualizations.
templates.prompt_template: For the movement of {{sport}}, based on the key frame {{key_frames}}, draw the trajectory and speed annotation {{metrics}}, angle of view {{camera_view}}, background {{background_style}}, color {{color_palette}}, frame {{aspect_ratio}}, and text prompts {{overlay_notes}} can be added. Emphasis on coherent trajectories and clear nodes.

placeholders.label: Perspective
enum_options: Looking down at the tactical board
placeholders.default: Looking down at the tactical board

placeholders.label: Color matching
placeholders.hint: Red and blue/gradient and other differentiation schemes
placeholders.default: High contrast red and blue color scheme

auto_checks: The trajectory is coherent and fully annotated
The background and color matching do not block the trajectory
manual_checklist: Are the keyframe scale and direction accurate?
Is the indicator location clear?
Are sports scenes easily identifiable?

templates.name: Font generation setting card
templates.short_description: provides generation tips for style, strokes and application scenarios for font creativity.
templates.prompt_template: Design font based on atmosphere {{base_font_mood}}, application scenario {{use_case}}, display copy {{display_text}}, font weight/contrast {{contrast_level}}, texture {{texture}}, language support {{language_support}}, typesetting {{alignment}}. The output includes sample sheets and glyph feature descriptions.

placeholders.label: Font atmosphere
placeholders.hint: Keywords: technology, elegance, childlike interest, etc.

auto_checks: Sample display display_text complete
Style corresponds to base_font_mood
manual_checklist: Does the font weight match the use case?
Does texture affect readability?
Does language support cover the characters that need to be displayed?

templates.name: Countdown event KV
templates.short_description: Automatically generate an activity header with countdown to enhance the sense of urgency.
templates.prompt_template: Generate countdown KV for activity {{event_name}}, end date {{end_date}}, main visual {{hero_visual}}, urgency {{urgency_level}}, countdown style {{countdown_style}}, color matching {{color_palette}}, brand exposure {{brand_logo_presence}}, frame {{aspect_ratio}}. Keep the subject clear and the countdown in focus.

auto_checks: The countdown information is clear and prominent
The main vision is not blocked by numbers
manual_checklist: Does the sense of urgency match the brand tone?
Are the date and time legible and unambiguous?
Does the color matching ensure contrast and readability?

templates.name: Multi-terminal set diagram generation
templates.short_description: The same theme automatically generates multi-size sets of pictures to keep the painting style consistent.
templates.prompt_template: Set of pictures around theme {{theme}} and core information {{main_message}}, output channel {{channel_list}}. Style reference {{style_reference}}, color matching {{palette}}, product elements {{product_elements}}, consistency level {{consistency_level}}, frame list {{aspect_ratios}}. Keep the layout on each end appropriate and visually unified.

placeholders.label: Product elements
placeholders.hint: Packaging/physical objects/icons that need to appear

auto_checks: Each size contains core information and brand
The style and tone are consistent within the set of pictures
manual_checklist: Is the layout optimized for the channel?
Is the cropping position safe and does not obscure the main information?
Is visual weight focused on the main message?

templates.name: Character array and vertical painting
templates.short_description: Multiple characters are drawn in a vertical array with the same style, keeping the settings consistent.
templates.prompt_template: Based on the world view {{world_setting}}, draw an array for the character {{characters}}, pose {{pose_variation}}, clothing {{attire_style}}, tone {{color_mood}}, background {{background_style}}, frame {{aspect_ratio}}. Keep facial features, proportions and style unified, and fine-tune expressions.

auto_checks: All characters have the same style
The pose matches pose_variation
manual_checklist: Are key characteristics retained across roles?
Is the array layout balanced and uncrowded?
Does the background treatment highlight the character?

templates.name: Multiple time periods in the same scene
templates.short_description: Output multiple light and shadow/weather versions of the same scene to keep the architecture and scenery consistent.
templates.prompt_template: Based on scenario {{environment_desc}}, generate {{variants_count}} versions, time period {{times_of_day}}, weather {{weather}}, camera location {{camera_angle}}, level of detail {{detail_level}}. Keep the main structure consistent and only change the light and shadow/atmosphere.

placeholders.label: Number of versions
placeholders.hint: How many time period versions are generated

auto_checks: The main structure is consistent in each version
The time period/light and shadow difference is clear
manual_checklist: Are weather/time changes natural?
Do the color temperature and light direction match the time period?
Does the level of detail match the settings?

templates.name: Material color palette mood board
templates.short_description: Generate material + color mood board, taking into account use case scenarios and labels.
templates.prompt_template: Output mood board for {{product_type}}, material keyword {{material_keywords}}, color {{color_keywords}}, usage scenario {{usage_scene}}, layout {{layout_style}}, label language {{label_language}}, atmosphere {{tone}}. Display material blocks and colors in grid/collage form.

auto_checks: Material and color block quantity coverage keywords
The text label is clear and does not block the material
manual_checklist: Is the color matching coordinated with the material?
Is the layout balanced and with appropriate white space?
Does the mood board reflect the use of the scene?

templates.name: Packaging development and prototype
templates.short_description: Generate packaging unfolded drawings and prototypes, including process and information bits.
templates.prompt_template: Design packaging development and prototype for {{packaging_type}}, flavor/fragrance {{flavor}}, die ratio {{dieline_ratio}}, process {{surface_finish}}, main pattern {{hero_pattern}}, necessary information {{mandatory_info}}, brand style {{brand_style}}, color matching {{color_palette}}. Ensure that the information bits are clear and the expansion is consistent with the three dimensions.

auto_checks: The expanded view is consistent with the texture of the prototype
The necessary information bits are readable and not missing
manual_checklist: Does the craftsmanship and color matching match the brand?
Is the die ratio reasonable and producible?
Are the subject and information levels clear?

templates.name: Social media matrix nine-square grid
templates.short_description: Generate a social media matrix with nine grids or multiple posts, and unify the tonality and CTA.
templates.prompt_template: Generate social media matrix for topic {{theme}} and product {{hero_product}}, number of posts {{posts_count}}, tags {{hashtags}}, style {{style}}, color scheme {{palette}}, CTA variations {{cta_variants}}, base frame {{aspect_ratio}}. Maintain alignment and brand consistency.

placeholders.label: Main products
placeholders.hint: Core SKU or key visual object

placeholders.label: Hashtag
placeholders.hint: Social media tags, separated by commas

placeholders.label: CTA variations
placeholders.hint: CTA sentence patterns for different posts

auto_checks: The nine-square grid is aligned without deformation
The main product is prominently displayed in at least three boxes
manual_checklist: Are the colors and fonts consistent?
Are the CTAs diverse and non-obstructive?
Is the composition suitable for social media cropping?

templates.name: Consistency icon set
templates.short_description: Generate a set of icon grids with a unified style to facilitate UI implementation.
templates.prompt_template: Generate icon set around manifest {{icon_list}}, style {{style}}, stroke {{stroke_weight}}, rounded {{corner}}, grid {{grid_size}}, color {{color}}. Keep the lines consistent and the strokes uniform, and output the grid layout.

auto_checks: Icon alignment to unified grid
Same line width/rounded corner
manual_checklist: Is the semantics clear and understandable?
Is the negative space balanced with the strokes?
Does the dual color/fill maintain a unified style?

templates.name: 3D product turntable frame
templates.short_description: Generate a 360° turntable frame sequence to keep the material consistent and the environment stable.
templates.prompt_template: Generate 360° turret frame for {{product_desc}}, angle step {{angle_step}} degrees, material {{material}}, light {{lighting}}, background {{background}}, style {{output_style}}, resolution {{resolution}}. Keep each frame consistent to facilitate the synthesis of turntable animation.

placeholders.label: Light
enum_options: Three points of light in the studio

auto_checks: The material and light of each frame are consistent
Angle step uniformly
manual_checklist: Is the background stable and jitter-free?
Are product details clear and noise-free?
Do reflections/shadows match the angle?

templates.name: AR Story Filter
templates.short_description: Generate interactive AR filter images, including overlay elements and interactive prompts.
templates.prompt_template: For theme {{theme}} / brand {{brand}}, generate AR filter screen, overlay element {{overlay_elements}}, interaction mode {{interaction}}, style {{style}}, color matching {{palette}}, CTA {{call_to_action}}, frame {{aspect_ratio}}. Highlight facial/scene recognition areas and safe margins.

auto_checks: It is safe to leave the facial/gesture area blank
Interaction prompts are clearly visible
manual_checklist: Does the overlay element obscure key areas?
Is the brand exposure natural and not excessive?
Does the style fit the theme and platform?

templates.name: Map Story Infographic
templates.short_description: Convert route/area information into map infographics, highlighting paths and indicators.
templates.prompt_template: Draw a map information chart for the area {{region}}, data points {{data_points}}, route/hotspot {{highlight_routes}}, map style {{map_style}}, focus level {{focus_level}}, color {{color_palette}}, annotation language {{annotation_language}}, frame {{aspect_ratio}}. It is necessary to ensure that the route is consistent with the geography.

auto_checks: Route/data point location and region matching
The annotations are clear and non-overlapping
manual_checklist: Does color matching differentiate between levels and routes?
Is the map scale consistent with the real geography?
Does the language of the text fit the audience?

templates.name: Brand Specification Single Page
templates.short_description: One-page summary of brand logo, colors, fonts and do/don't.
templates.prompt_template: Generate a single page of specifications for the brand {{brand_name}}, including logo usage {{logo_usage}}, color palette {{palette}}, font {{typography}}, picture style {{imagery_style}}, prohibited items {{forbidden}}, layout {{layout_style}}, and frame {{aspect_ratio}}. Highlight available specifications and examples.

placeholders.label: Color palette
placeholders.hint: Main color, secondary color, accent color

auto_checks: Logo/swatch/font information is complete
Key specifications for unobstructed layout
manual_checklist: Do & Don't Is there a clear contrast?
Is the color and font presentation consistent with the brand?
Are the actual landing spacing/dimensions marked?

templates.name: Illustration of cooking steps
templates.short_description: Convert recipes into step diagrams/nine-square grid to facilitate quick learning.
templates.prompt_template: Generate step diagram of cooking {{dish_name}}, portion {{servings}}, steps {{steps}}, tools {{tools}}, style {{style}}, color {{palette}}, navigation style {{overlay_nav}}, frame {{aspect_ratio}}. Emphasis on ingredients/heat/time icons.

auto_checks: The number of steps matches the input steps
The numbers or connections are clear
manual_checklist: Is the heat/time information easy to read?
Are ingredients and tools identifiable?
Does typesetting avoid crowding?

templates.name: Scientific process diagram
templates.short_description: A schematic representation of a scientific/engineering process that is both accurate and concise.
templates.prompt_template: Generate a schematic diagram of the process {{steps}} of the topic {{topic}}, with accuracy {{precision}}, icon style {{icon_style}}, color tone {{color_mood}}, frame {{aspect_ratio}}, and remarks {{annotations}}. Make sure the direction, sequence and indicators are clear.

auto_checks: The sequence of steps is consistent with the direction of the arrow
Color differentiation is clear in stages
manual_checklist: Are the symbols/formulas accurate?
Is the information density appropriate?
Does the accuracy comply with the precision setting?

templates.name: Dashboard module card
templates.short_description: Generate a single KPI module, taking into account data comparison and brand sense.
templates.prompt_template: Generate dashboard module for indicator {{metric_name}}, comparison window {{comparison_window}}, chart type {{viz_type}}, KPI list {{kpis}}, audience {{audience}}, color {{color_palette}}, density {{density}}, frame {{aspect_ratio}}. Ensure data is readable and white space is balanced.

placeholders.label: Comparison window
placeholders.hint: Such as last 7 days vs last week

auto_checks: Core indicators and comparison windows are readable
Color contrast meets accessibility
manual_checklist: Does the information level fit the audience?
Does the graph match the KPI?
Are numbers/units clearly marked?

templates.name: Process scene visualization
templates.short_description: Convert service flow/business flow into visual process or scene step-by-step.
templates.prompt_template: Draw the process {{workflow}} as {{orientation}}, participants {{actors}}, channel {{channels}}, risk point {{highlight_risks}}, style {{style}}, color {{color_palette}}, frame {{aspect_ratio}}. The stages/responsible persons and key touchpoints need to be highlighted.

auto_checks: The main process sequence is clear and readable
Clear distinction between roles/channels
manual_checklist: Are risk points clearly marked?
Does the layout avoid visual crowding?
Do colors and text support accessible reading?

templates.name: Portrait style reproduction
templates.short_description: Preserve character features and postures and migrate to the target style.
templates.prompt_template: Generate a portrait based on the character description {{subject_description}}, with the style reference {{target_style_reference}}. Expression {{expression}}, Light {{lighting}}, Background {{background}}, Accessory Description {{accessory_notes}}, Hue {{color_palette}}. Keep the proportions of your facial features consistent with your posture.

auto_checks: Character characteristics and posture should be consistent
The light and background are not too eye-catching
manual_checklist: Does style transfer retain the original look?
Are the skin color and clothing color natural?
Do the accessories coordinate with the style?

templates.name: Indoor layout sketch
templates.short_description: Generate interior layout diagram based on area and requirements, including light and style.
templates.prompt_template: Generate layout schematic for {{room_type}}, area {{area}} ㎡, requirements/constraints {{constraints}}, furniture {{furniture_list}}, style {{style}}, light plan {{lighting_plan}}, color {{color_palette}}, viewing angle {{orientation}}. Keep movement lines and scale reasonable.

auto_checks: The main furniture positions and movement lines are clear
The proportion and area are generally reasonable
manual_checklist: Do the lighting and lamp positions meet the requirements?
Are the style and color matching consistent?
Is there enough room for walking?

templates.name: Game level mood board
templates.short_description: Output the level mood board according to the theme, including key scenes and color atmosphere.
templates.prompt_template: Generate a mood board for the level of game theme {{genre}}, level target {{level_goal}}, key scene elements {{key_setpieces}}, camera position {{camera_angle}}, reference style {{reference_style}}, tone {{color_palette}}, atmosphere {{mood}}, frame {{aspect_ratio}}. Highlight the scene levels and light and shadow.

auto_checks: Level objectives correspond to scene elements
Lighting and shadow/camera position are consistent with the theme and gameplay
manual_checklist: Are the tone and atmosphere consistent?
Are key scenes identifiable and layered?
Is the reference style consistent across elements?

templates.name: One-stop comics (translation + coloring + texture)
templates.short_description: An integrated template for black and white comic translation, coloring, and material conversion.
templates.prompt_template: Multi-step editing of uploaded black and white comics: 1) Text translation: Translate all {{source_language}} text to {{target_language}}, retain the tone, put the translation back to the original dialogue bubble, font {{text_style}}. 2) Coloring: Color from black and white to {{color_style}} without changing the storyboard, character expressions and {{keep_elements}}. 3) Material conversion: The overall picture is converted to {{material_style}}, while the storyboard rhythm and character positions are still maintained. Output: Generate a complete comic page ({{output_layout}}) without adding storyboards, additional instructions or watermarks.

placeholders.label: Remain unchanged
placeholders.hint: Storyboards and content that must be retained
placeholders.default: Storyboard layout, character expressions, background composition

auto_checks: Replace all dialogue text with target_language
The storyboard layout and character positions remain unchanged
manual_checklist: Has all text been successfully converted into the target language?
Are the storyboards and screen content kept intact (not redrawn or altered)?
Are the newly added colors/materials unified and not fragmented?

example_inputs.name: Japanese manga English translation and coloring

templates.name: Bilingual movie key visual poster
templates.short_description: Output Chinese and English titles, subtitles and complete poster layout at once.
templates.prompt_template: Generate an art poster for the work: the scene revolves around {{scene_description}}, the overall painting style {{art_style}}, and the frame {{aspect_ratio}}. Text layout: The main title is mainly {{work_title_cn}}, supplemented by {{work_title_en}}, and the font is {{font_style}}; the subtitle uses {{subtitle_cn}} / {{subtitle_en}} (if provided); decide whether to add small characters such as credits and festival logos based on {{text_density}}. It is required that all Chinese/English characters are clear and legible, without garbled characters, and the main visual is clean and layered.

placeholders.label: Painting style
placeholders.hint: The overall style of the poster

auto_checks: The main title includes work_title_cn and work_title_en
The frame complies with the aspect_ratio setting
manual_checklist: Does the main title appear in both Chinese and English and is it spelled correctly?
Does the scene match scene_description?
Even if there are many characters, is it still clear and readable without any sense of garbled characters?

placeholder_values.scene_description: On the streets of New York in the 1980s, a lonely puppy looked at the subway train going away

templates.name: Chinese structure explanation diagram
templates.short_description: Make the system/process into a Chinese structure or process explanation diagram.
templates.prompt_template: Create a Chinese explanation diagram of {{diagram_type}} for {{topic}}: the main structure or process is shown in the center, and the surrounding partitions are labeled by components or steps. Use standardized Chinese, the amount of information is controlled by {{detail_level}}, and the text density is controlled by {{text_density}}; each important node has a title and a brief explanation. Picture style {{visual_style}}, layout clear and easy to read.

auto_checks: All text is in Chinese
Contains partition or label description
manual_checklist: Are the various parts of text aligned in the correct position?
Does the amount of information fit into the explanatory diagram and is it not too empty or too crowded?
Are there any obvious typos or garbled characters in Chinese?

example_inputs.name: Explanation of the wooden pagoda structure in Yingxian County

templates.name: Problem solution draft paper
templates.short_description: Calculate and display the problem-solving process in a handwritten scratch paper style.
templates.prompt_template: Write the complete solution to {{problem_source}} on a scratch paper style page. Language usage {{language}}, reasoning step by step, writing equations or text explanations for each step, key steps can be circled or marked with arrows. The paper texture is draft paper, and the handwriting is {{handwriting_style}}; the layout follows {{layout_style}}, like a real student's handwritten draft rather than printing. Give final answers and keep the process coherent.

auto_checks: Includes problem solving steps and final answer
The text language matches the language setting
manual_checklist: Is the calculation correct? Is there any step skipping?
Are the steps to solve the problem coherent and readable, like a real draft?
Are key steps clearly marked (circles/arrows)?

placeholder_values.problem_source: Find the acceleration and friction of the slider on the inclined surface, given the mass, inclination angle and friction coefficient.

templates.name: Thesis/long article → Whiteboard writing
templates.short_description: Organize papers or long articles into whiteboard photos of teachers in class.
templates.prompt_template: Condensed the core content of {{source_type}} "{{topic}}" into a whiteboard writing effect: organize the writing on the blackboard according to {{key_sections}}, use handwriting style, depict the relationship between titles, key points, arrows and frames, and use pens of different colors to mark key points. The layout should be in accordance with {{board_layout}}, and the text density should be controlled in accordance with {{text_density}}. Make sure it is readable and hierarchical, like a whiteboard photo of a teacher explaining on the spot. Do not make it into a poster or a mixed picture and text advertisement.

auto_checks: The blackboard contains key points in key_sections
The writing style is handwritten on a whiteboard rather than printed
manual_checklist: Does it capture the core of the original text?
Is the writing on the blackboard readable and hierarchical?
Is it like a whiteboard written by the teacher instead of a poster?

placeholder_values.key_sections: Model structure; self-attention formula; training settings; experimental indicators; conclusion

templates.name: Game interface screenshot template
templates.short_description: Generate HUD/chat/checkout interface screenshots for specific types of games.
templates.prompt_template: Generate a screenshot of the game interface, type {{game_genre}}, reference {{reference_game}}, scene focus {{scene_focus}}. The screen must contain {{ui_elements}}, and the position of each UI element must be clear. The chat/text format is {{language}}, and the chat style is {{chat_style}} (if it’s mutual chatting, keep it real but not offline). The overall texture is close to real game screenshots, and HUD, skill bar, mini map and other information are readable.

placeholders.label: UI elements
placeholders.hint: Health bar, mini map, skill bar, chat box, etc.
placeholders.default: Health bar, mini map, skill bar, chat box

auto_checks: Screen contains core HUD/chat elements in ui_elements
The interface text language conforms to the language setting
manual_checklist: Can the UI tell what type of game it is at a glance?
Does the chat content match the temperament of the game player?
Is the interface layout clear and the elements not confusing?

placeholder_values.ui_elements: Score, record, MVP mark, chat box

templates.name: Product multi-scene rendering (Chinese text fidelity)
templates.short_description: Multi-scene high-quality product rendering to ensure consistent and clear text.
templates.prompt_template: Generate multi-scene high-quality renderings for {{product_type}}. Product design: {{product_design}}, key text {{text_content}}, keep text form consistent and clear in all scenes. The products are displayed in different environments in sequence according to {{scenes}}. The lighting style uses {{lighting_style}} to maintain real light, shadow and material. It is prohibited to modify the text or pattern of the product itself. The picture can be used as a poster or the main image of the material.

placeholders.label: Text content
placeholders.hint: Main title, subtitle, brand name, etc.

placeholders.label: Scene list
placeholders.hint: Such as: record stores, city streets, concert venues

auto_checks: text_content is clearly readable in all scenes
Product styling remains consistent in different scenes
manual_checklist: Is the product font exactly the same in all images?
Is the scene switching natural and not like a hard-coupled texture?
Is the overall style suitable as a poster/material drawing?

placeholder_values.product_design: Vinyl texture shell, the cover is Jay Chou's silhouette and neon characters
placeholder_values.text_content: Main title "MOJITO"; subtitle Jay Chou; brand JVR
placeholder_values.scenes: Record store shelves; under neon lights on city streets; souvenir booths at concerts

templates.name: Pindou/pixel hand-made style
templates.short_description: Convert any subject into a hand-made illustration or product picture with a pixel art feel.
templates.prompt_template: Presents {{subject}} in the bean/pixel hand-made style: all shapes are composed of particle bean-like shapes, with a grid feel. Scene type {{scene_type}}, work dimension {{beads_dimension}}, color chart style {{color_palette}}. The display method is {{presentation_style}}, which ensures that the outline and features of the subject are identifiable, and the picture has a hand-made texture rather than ordinary pixel paintings or building blocks.

auto_checks: The main body is presented as spelled beans, with a grid feel
The main body characteristics are identifiable
manual_checklist: Can you tell at a glance that it is a puzzle piece, rather than an ordinary pixel painting/building block?
Is the subject still identifiable?
Are the colors and hand-made textures comfortable and unified?

templates.name: Poem scroll + scene ink scroll
templates.short_description: The first volume is calligraphy and the second volume is ink painting. The full text is clear and the painting echoes.
templates.prompt_template: Generate a long scroll with upper and lower divisions: write complete {{poem_full_text}} at the top, calligraphy style {{calligraphy_style}}, title {{poem_title}}, author {{poet_name}} and can be signed; {{painting_style}} depicts the artistic conception of {{scene_description}} at the bottom, and the frame ratio is {{layout_ratio}}. The long scroll is enough to unfold, the text is clear and the words are missing, the picture echoes the poetry, the text does not block the picture below, and can complement the night/fog and other atmospheres.

placeholders.label: Description of artistic conception
placeholders.hint: The scene/atmosphere to be expressed in the picture

placeholders.label: Up and down ratio
placeholders.hint: Scroll up: proportion of the bottom screen

auto_checks: The first volume presents poem_full_text in full and the text is clear and flawless
The theme of the picture below conforms to the scene_description and echoes the poetry
The calligraphy area is clearly distinguished from the picture, and the text does not cover the main picture
manual_checklist: Are there signatures for poem_title and poet_name?
Are the calligraphy style and painting_style coordinated?
Are the scroll length and layout_ratio as expected?

placeholder_values.poem_full_text: The Xunyang River sees off guests on the first night, and the maple leaves and flowers are rustling in autumn. The master dismounted and was in the boat. He wanted to drink wine but there was no orchestra. It's too late to be drunk and happy to say goodbye. When we say goodbye, the vast river is soaked in the moon.
placeholder_values.scene_description: On the Xunyang River in autumn night, there are fishing fires, maple leaves falling, moonlight on the river, and silhouettes of farewells on the boat

templates.name: Chat record simulation screenshots (WeChat/IM)
templates.short_description: Screenshot of the simulated chat interface, restoring the specified App UI, avatar and message order.
templates.prompt_template: Generate a full-screen screenshot of the {{app_type}} chat interface, with the title {{chat_title}} at the top. Draw the avatar and nickname according to {{participants}}, and the color and layout of the left and right bubbles conform to the {{app_type}} habits. Messages are arranged in the order of {{messages}}, the text language is {{ui_language}}, and can have timestamp/read status. Interface elements need to be authentic, with no fake buttons or spelling errors, and text that is clear and readable.

placeholders.label: Chat title
placeholders.hint: Group name or individual chat title

placeholders.label: Participant list
placeholders.hint: A list containing nicknames and avatar descriptions, JSON is recommended

placeholders.label: Message sequence
placeholders.hint: Sender, text, expression/picture description, JSON is recommended

auto_checks: Chat text language matches ui_language setting
The message sequence is consistent with the messages description, and the top title is chat_title
manual_checklist: Is it obvious at first glance that the UI specifies app_type?
Do the avatar and bubble match the correct sender?
Are there fake UI elements or obvious typos?

example_inputs.name: Melon-eating group in the Forbidden City

placeholder_values.chat_title: Melon-eating group in the Forbidden City
placeholder_values.participants: [{"name":"De Fei","avatar":"Avatar of a woman wearing Qing palace clothes"},{"name":"Imperial sword in front of the emperor","avatar":"Silhouette of a guard holding a sword"},{"name":"Melon Master","avatar":"Orange cat wearing sunglasses"}]
placeholder_values.messages: [{"sender":"De Fei","text":"I heard that someone has climbed over the wall again today?"},{"sender":"The emperor has a knife in front of him","text":"Don't talk nonsense, send a screenshot to see","image":"Blurred surveillance screenshot"},{"sender":"Melon Master","text":"Hahaha, see you in ten minutes"}]

templates.name: Pet Cosplay & Brand Co-branded Poster
templates.short_description: Upload a pet image and create a co-branded poster using specified characters and brand elements.
templates.prompt_template: Let the pet wear the costumes and props of {{cosplay_character}} while retaining the face shape, coat color and expression of {{pet_description}}. If provided {{brand_elements}}, incorporate brand colors/logo/scene into poster. Layout the main visual and title according to {{poster_layout}}, and the text style follows {{text_style}}. The whole thing needs to have a real commercial poster feel, and the Cos and brand elements should naturally fit together.

placeholders.label: Poster layout
placeholders.hint: Key visual, title, and logo position description

auto_checks: The pet’s face shape and fur color remain consistent with pet_description
Cosplay costumes and props are fully presented and fit the body
If brand_elements are provided, the brand color and logo should be clear and reasonably positioned
manual_checklist: Does the poster layout comply with poster_layout?
Does the text style conform to text_style and have a commercial feel?
Are the Cos and brand elements natural and not inconsistent?

placeholder_values.pet_description: A fat orange cat with a round face, an innocent expression, and a sitting posture
placeholder_values.brand_elements: KFC red and white color scheme, logo, in-store counter and paper bag
placeholder_values.poster_layout: The main visual is in the center, with the logo in the upper left corner, the slogan and price in the lower right corner

templates.name: Single picture poster style migration (change color + change category + change copywriting)
templates.short_description: Keep the original poster layout/font unchanged, only replace the theme, color and copywriting.
templates.prompt_template: Redraw the poster according to {{new_theme}} and main color {{new_main_color}} while keeping {{keep_elements}} (layout, font, composition) unchanged. Replace all {{content_to_replace}} with {{new_content_description}}, including product, year, title and small words, and do not leave any residue of the old theme. The overall style follows the original layout, ensuring that colors and copywriting are uniformly updated.

placeholders.label: New main color
placeholders.hint: New primary color or color scheme

placeholders.label: Replace element
placeholders.hint: Copywriting/product/icon that needs to be changed from the original image

placeholders.label: Keep elements
placeholders.hint: Composition, typeface or decoration that must be maintained

auto_checks: The layout and font of the original poster remain unchanged
All old copy/year/category are replaced with new theme content
The overall main color is switched to new_main_color
manual_checklist: Are there any old theme elements or years that have not been replaced?
Do the new categories and copy naturally fit the new theme?
Is keep_elements destroyed?

example_inputs.name: Year of the Snake 2025 → Year of the Horse 2026

placeholder_values.new_theme: The Year of the Snake zodiac poster was changed to the Year of the Horse zodiac
placeholder_values.content_to_replace: Snake illustration, SNAKE 2025 copywriting, zodiac icon, small characters of supporting characters
placeholder_values.new_content_description: The main visual of horse head silhouette, HORSE 2026 title, small blessing words and icons related to horses
placeholder_values.keep_elements: The composition frame, font style, and light and shadow levels of the original poster

templates.name: Book page continuation (next page layout + illustration continuation)
templates.short_description: Continue the content and layout of the previous page to generate the text and illustration layout of the next page.
templates.prompt_template: Generate the layout and illustrations of the next page for {{book_type}}. The text style uses {{text_style}} and the typesetting follows {{page_layout}}. The content needs to follow the plot/knowledge points of {{content_summary}}. The font size and line spacing should be consistent with the previous page. If there are illustrations, the style and tone should be consistent. Generate complete page layouts rather than pure illustrations.

placeholders.label: Summary of previous page content
placeholders.hint: Key plot or knowledge points on the previous page

placeholders.label: Typesetting layout
placeholders.hint: Single and double columns, pictures and text, etc.

auto_checks: The layout is consistent with page_layout, including text and necessary illustrations
The text style conforms to text_style and remains consistent with the previous page
The content takes over the plot/theme of content_summary
manual_checklist: Does the picture continue the overall style and tone of the book?
Is the proportion of pictures and text easy to read, and is there enough white space?
Are there any plot points or terms that conflict with the previous page?

example_inputs.name: Next page of the picture book "Little Fox Exploring the Moon"

placeholder_values.content_summary: The previous page tells about the little fox lying on the grass at night and looking at the moon, and decided to build a small wooden ladder to reach the moonlight.
